about_the_game:
Tangling Notes - Xiaoyao Summer Style Costume (with 29999 Ling Coin) DLC contains Ling Xiaoyao character - Summer Style Costume, with 29999 Ling Coin attached to the skin.
"Beautiful dancing with soft waist and limbs makes Huayan Ruoyao clearer."
Dressed in modern sexy swimsuit, facing the warm and humid sea breeze, immersed in the light blue ocean, a cool date with the hot summer!
